name: Vagrant + HyperV + CentOS 開發環境設置
body:
## 準備
* 下載安裝Vagrant, 安裝完後需要先重啟WINDOW
* `mkdir demo`
* `cddemo`
* `vagrant init`
* `vagrant box add pyranja/centos-6`
* `vagrant up --provider hyperv`

## 問題
_如果遇到mount folder失敗情況, 可賞試修改vagrantfile, 設置_
_config.vm.synced_folder ".", "/vagrant", type: "smb", mount_options: ["username=YOUR_USERNAME","password=YOUR_PASSWORD"]_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
